channel.title: Walking in seers then to black screen
channel.description:
I was walking and running in seers and kept going into a black screen any fix for this? I think this is client sided not sure.
Still need help if anyone knows. Lol, I guess no one knows how to fix I am not the only one. Thanks for the help.
